questions.question: What shape is the circular flow model
What is the circular flow model?

choices.answer: A diagram that shows the flow of money in the economy.
A diagram that shows the speed of money in the economy.

questions.question: The circular flow model is a measure of growth
What are the categories in the circular flow model
Can the circular flow model be measured?
What is the role of the government?

choices.answer: To collect taxes and provide benefits and subsidies
To provide taxes and collect benefits and subsidies
To build the economy through policies and bills

questions.question: What is the role of households

choices.answer: To own and sell resources and pay tax to government
To buy and consume resources and pay tax to the government
To earn money for the government and pay tax to the government

questions.question: What is the role of producers

choices.answer: To sell resources and import goods
To buy and sell resources and export goods
To buy and sell goods, export and import goods.

questions.question: What is the role of overseas

choices.answer: Provide imports for import payments and pay for export receipts
Provide exports and pay for export receipts

questions.question: What is the role of financial

choices.answer: To receive savings, pay interest and provide investments for loans
To receive savings, pay interest and provide loans for investments
To invest savings back into loans for business firms to grow the economy
